overview: The Eyes of the World is a 1930 American pre-Code drama film directed by Henry King and written by Brewster Morse and Clarke Silvernail. The film stars Eulalie Jensen, Florence Roberts, Una Merkel, and Nance O'Neil.
tagline: WHAT IS RIGHT AND WHAT IS WRONG? CONSCIENCE TELLS ONE THING. LOVE INSISTS UPON ANOTHER BUT HOW DOES IT LOOK IN THE EYES OF THE WORLD?
title: The Eyes of the World
